subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
Perhaps a [[substrate]] loan. Compare {{cog|tai-pro|*hiːᴬ||vagina}}, whence {{cog|th|หี}}.

Alternatively, {{zh-ref|Bauer (1991)}} proposes that it is related to {{zh-l|*屄}}: ''*mai'' > ''*bai'' (cf. {{cog|nan|膣屄}} ''tsi<sup>1</sup> bai<sup>1</sup>'') > ''*phai'' (cf. Chengdu ''phi<sup>1</sup>'') > ''*hai''. Also compare {{cog|tbq}} words: {{cog|nmf|hai||vulva}}, {{cog|mro|||vagina; vulva|tr=kai}}, {{cog|brx|||vagina|tr='''ki''' ʈuʔ}}.

subSections.title: Definitions
